divs: Sighting DetailsFor some reason I was awakened and felt there was something outside,thinking a bunch of dogs,or someone stealing gas out of my vehickle,I grabbed my gun and went outside.As I walked around the yard,and we have a river less than 200yrds from my home,I was completely compelled to look up.Ther is something that I will never forget as long as the days that I live on this earth.The air was foggy as it is a lot of the time,living next to that much water,but the air literally had a ceiling to it.The best way I can describe it is when you are swimming under the water and look up and you see the water from upside-down.That night the sky had such a ceiling and it was very thick,even though you could see through it it was there,and no I'm not crazy,This ceiling was about 40ft above me.I could'nt help but be amazed at this and had a very calm demenore and was not scared or even felt confused.I was totally amazed and in awe of "how was this happening".Now since what I did after that really got me in trouble I willnot discuss this part,only in total anoninity.Then THE MOST FASINATING HAPPENED, First I looked to my right and saw the blueish almost nearly liquid type object coming from the direction of the river and got to about the end of the liquid ceiling and changed form to a flat type object and went at what looked to be a perfect 90% angle straight up.Whonce it hit the ceiling,it was VERY apparent that it did make a small contact and went through it and was gone,now I don;t know why,but I immedieately looked to my left and I saw the exact same thing,only it was delayed just enough so I could see the one to my right then the one to my left.I can see it right now just as clearly as I did that night about 8 weeks ago.I don't talk about it because when I did it caused me tremendious complications and have been made fun of ever since.I lost my entire reputation that night by just telling the truth.I just HAD TO LET SOMEONE KNOW THAT MAY BELIEVE ME .THANKS FOR LISTENING
Summary: Light,but deep blue color-deffineatly metal but almost robotic,transforming seamlessly into long flat object
